name: todo-react-components
description: React components for advanced Todo App

scripts.watch: clear; echo "* NPM UPDATE *"; npm update; echo "* CLEAN * HTML * WATCHIFY *"; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s watch:all
scripts.build: clear; echo "* NPM UPDATE *"; npm update; echo "* * * *  BUILD  * * * *"; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s build:all
scripts.watch:all: npm run -s clean:demo && (npm run -s watch:js & npm run -s watch:html)
scripts.watch:js: watchify $npm_package_config_demo_js_entry_file --extension=.js --extension=.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] --debug -o 'exorcist $npm_package_config_demo_build_folder/build.js.map > $npm_package_config_demo_build_folder/build.js && echo ---------WATCHIFY--------`date +%r`'
scripts.build:all: npm run -s clean:build && npm run -s build:js
scripts.build:js: npm run -s build:js:browserify | npm run -s partial:uglify -- --mangle > $npm_package_config_build_folder/todo-react-components.js && echo ---------JS-------------`date +%r`
scripts.build:js:browserify: browserify $npm_package_config_build_entry_file --extension=.js --extension=.jsx --detectGlobals false --standalone todo-react-components -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ]

author: Baz <baz@thinkloop.com>
